data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Bioko Sur, Equatorial Guinea will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bioko Sur, Equatorial Guinea
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Bioko Sur, Equatorial Guinea and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Bioko Sur with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Bioko Sur, Equatorial Guinea by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Moca
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Moca, Bioko Sur, Equatorial Guinea.
Lord, help the people of Bioko Sur, Equatorial Guinea to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Bioko Sur, Equatorial Guinea to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 26,000 people living in the state of Bioko Sur.
